transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Subhash ji se baat kar rahe hain hum?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek aap Marble se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ji Subhash ji main naam sir aapse IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha aapka business manager kaise hain aap?
Customer: Main theek hai ji.
Executive: Ji Kunal ka senior baat kar raha tha to actually mere paas Kunal ka update aaya tha aapse shayad uska meeting hua tha discussion hua tha aap kuch issue face kar rahe the by lead ko lekar right jo ki aapka call nahi ho pa raha tha to wo mujhse pucha tha ki matlab kya kya issue aaya tha kya reason aaya tha to mujhe batayenge sir kuch issue agar aap face kar rahe the jo main sort out kar saku.
Customer: Jab ye IndiaMART kholte hain na.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: To usme ye aata hai no relevant buylead.
Customer: No relevant buylead likha hua aata hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To pehle to ye sari aati thi.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Fir recent recent pe jaati hai to recent kya lagati hai hai na ha recent pe lagati hai.
Customer: Ha pehle wo sari aati thi ab wo to direct ye aati hai no relevant buylead.
Executive: Ye no relevant buylead agar aa rahi hai na pehle to ek check karna hai ki koi filter to nahi lag raha us pe theek hai dusra aap ye check kijiyega dusra ye check kijiyega ki jis product ke aap buylead check kar rahe ho right wo product abhi aisa to nahi hai ki uska koi aur synonym bhi hota ho jo add ho sakta ho agar koi synonym hota hai jo add ho synonym matlab use kisi aur naam se to nahi jana jata market mein.
Customer: Samajh gaye to agar product ko aapke jo jisse aap deal kar rahe ho to matlab aap kis product mein abhi jaise deal kar rahe ho.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Marble ki stone statues mein.
Executive: Ha ji stone marble mein.
Customer: Stone marble mein deal kar rahe ho ab isko pathar ke naam se bhi jana jata hoga marble ke naam se bhi jana jata hoga stone ke naam se bhi jana jata hoga right to alag alag synonyms hote hain right to un synonyms ka naam dal ke check kiya kijiyega ki waha se to koi buylead nahi generate ho rahi hai un product pe right aur agar generate ho rahi hai to aap wo bhi consume kar sakte ho.
Executive: Actually main kyuki abhi dekh raha tha jo buyleads aap logo ke liye available hai kuch kuch right recent mein.
Executive: Aap waha se bhi check kar sakte ho ki koi kaam ki buylead hai ki nahi hai agar aapko koi kaam ki buylead dikhti hai to waha se consume kar liya kijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi hai na sir main ye keh raha hu wo sir ye bol rahe the bhai past lead mein kafi hai aur mere paas ek bhi lead nahi aayi sare din mobile lekar baitha baitha hua hu main ek bhi lead 100 10 kya keh rahe the wo.
Customer: Wo bol rahe the bhai isme lead kafi hai past lead mein to past lead mein to kafi hai lekin mere paas to mobile mein to screen pe to ek bhi lead nahi aayi main do teen ghante baitha rehta hu aadi.
Customer: Hmm mobile ko lekar ke.
Customer: Ye baat thi sir.
Executive: Achcha to aapka jo mobile ka app hai na usko ek baar open karo.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Open kar rakha hai lekin ab mobile call chal rahi hai na ab wo network network.
Executive: Main aapko bata du karna kya hai ki call call karne ke baad aap try kar lena pehle app ko open karna.
Executive: Theek hai waha par aap ek baar buylead search karne ka option aayega aapka jo main product hai jiski aapko buylead chahiye us pe click karna search karna.
Executive: Aur jo bhi aapka available buylead dikhe aapke kaam ki wo buylead aap consume karne ka try karna dekhna waha buylead consume ho jayegi abhi jo main recent buylead dekh pa raha hu na.
Executive: Ha ji ji ji boliye aap kuch boliye.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hu jab ye isko kholte hain na isme direct upar heading mein aata hai no relevant buylead pehle aisa nahi aata tha.
Executive: Koi filter laga hua hoga sir.
Customer: Filter kaha se lagta hai search mein.
Executive: Upar dekho upar filter ke option aata hai kuch kuch filter laga hua hoga is wajah se aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ha wo itne puch raha hu isme kuch kuch na kuch to hua pada hai isme na.
Executive: Kuch filter laga hua hai ek kaam karo aap WhatsApp number batao kya hai.
Customer: WhatsApp number yahi hai sir.
Executive: Ek baar repeat karoge kyuki main office ke number se baat kar raha hu ha ji.
Customer: 82
Customer: 82
Customer: 333
Customer: 9
Customer: 15
Customer: 11
Executive: Dekhiye maine hello sir karke ek message bheja hai kya hello sir.
Customer: Aaya.
Customer: Ha ji.
Customer: Aaya na ab dekho ab mujhe screenshot bhejo apna wo open karke.
Customer: Achcha wo open karke hai na ha wo app open karke mujhe screenshot bhejiye main aapko dikhaunga waha pe kya karna hai theek hai na.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi bhejta hu main.
Executive: Call ke baad screenshot mujhe bhejo theek hai sir main aapko batata hu kaise karna hai theek hai ji.
Executive: Call main kat raha hu aap ek baar screenshot bhejo fir main aapko batata hu theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any buyleads.

- Sees "no relevant buylead" message.



Resolution:

- Asked to check for applied filters.

- Suggested checking for product synonyms.

- Asked to send a screenshot of the app.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, synonyms, app
